post.body: cept I've got details, yet, not his *actual* name. I know who i;m looking for.......but.......argh
it's dumb. i know WHO i'm looking for, tho his name is sketchy, so google.... not helpful. friend search on twitter GO ME!
well THAT blows. I *know* that i know who he is. except, I can't find him. i can't remember his handle!!! bah!!!
you don't love me. that's clear. I coulda had hook ups for you.... srsly. Have *connects* bah. I miss talking to you!!!
sugar. we met. we talked. we hung. you took pix of me. you know, the ones on @valleywag. follow me dude! why don't you ,# me?
wow. your schedule blows my mind. I would **LOVE** to travel that much!!! this is why I'm starting a travel portal. srsly.
hey sugar! how're you? *where* are you? started talking to @pitzi in Tel Aviv. (high tech blogger perhaps?) :D
@kcarruthers hope you have a brilliant day!!!
you bet sugar! DM me your name so I know who i'm talking to. ;) I'm *there* thursday! :D
&, I've got quite a bit in the can, so it's a matter of tweaking & scheduling. working on getting to where I can work ahead
nope, it's just me. :D I have a *bit* of a type a personality. I have 4 blogs I write and am working on freelance articles 2
good news is, that's actually not a problem. am already 1/3 of the way through the first.
my sites. I have 15 articles to write between now and tomorrow @ this time.
oooh right all the boookmarking sites too... delicious, digg, stumble, reddit.... anyone else? What else is there?
k - so i've got here, seesmic, flickr, friendfeed, Identi.ca, linkedin, facebook... what am i missing??
nah jeremy would't do that to me :)
i only stopped because i had to go to the hair guru
;) well, everything you said was true for me too! :D
I;ve been told vegetarians would become omnivores i I was their chef.
HA! I saw "ingenious" and was totally intrigued till you said don't try this at home! :P
what's that, just by saying "mmmhmm me too, and?" ;P
I am an excellent cook and constantly make people moan with how good my dishes taste.
mmmhmmm. me too. and?
hee! nah , it was a good show! :P
mmmhmmm. me too. and?
oh i'm the first to admit, I'm not remotely humble. humility is overrated. ;) I am also charming, and scary smart. ;)
:D thanks! yeah, that was a rather rockin' night! Am just now blogging (last b4 bed) Brian & Lori's Vodka Cup drinks. :D
might wanna check your twitterfeed settings, all your posts are coming through 2x.
gah - this week went by WAY too fast & next week is full of xmas crud. SO, near xmas it'll be quiet then anyways :D
feel better!!!
kick it. that's always my solution. :D
I'm thinkin that's not a bad idea. I have a couple of book profiles I want to set up to start marketing as I write them....
he said that was one of the more fun concerts he's done. :D the month with U2 comes pretty close tho.
we even have PG's xmas lights! they had a ton of lights strung under the stage. But yeah, R pushed PG around in the bubble etc
excellent. everyone's telling me that '09 is gonna be an awesome year. *crosses fingers*
i don't have anything specific ATM but will DM you if I come up w something. :)
ahhh... haven't been there. think i've driven past it tho.....
brrr. stay warm! friends or family? and when do you get back? I still need to be taught spanish. :D (espanol)
yeah.... she's .... new i expect. it was an image in HTML that used a LOT of buzzwords. (sigh)
excellent news - tell them to be better. across the board.
that is *exactly* where I am today. taking a break from life, but writing w. blanket and kitty on me. :)
wow. that's scary, and also, kinda cool. but ick. but cool.
ha... 'cats' made me go... "wait - you have kitties??" ;P
i think the phrase you're looking for is "fuck THAT shit". ;)
mmm esp @ voya w/ @thenextstagemag. Brilliant, really. You can join us if you want! 6 ish... Voya. melville st.
red onion.... where's that? we;re close to H Mary's and love walking in the quiet of the 1st snowfall...
omg. you can HAVE all my snow. brr. dislike. I don't *do* snow.
ha! i thought you meant the outside cold...wondered how you could forget given the snow. :P
@brianleroux @quikness enjoy!! I'll be warm, inside and drinking cocktails with @tinhead. :D
did you see my xmas wish? :D http://budurl.com/jhc6
in 4 hours, i'll be drinking fantastic cocktails with @tinhead. go us!
which direction? 15th or 7th?
apparently. :(
shush you. phone is off and i'm gonna try and sleep again. hopefully @lisamedia doesn't get up TOO early.....
of course!! that's totally the best time! Good old Murphy. He's such an ass!!
wow!! you really really DID break it! i went to check it out and it was totally gone! damn dude!
good turn out considering the weather there!
hard to be helpful when my suggestions're shot down!
then i'm retty much out of suggestions for ya. get a new job? i got nuthin
rabbit?
kitties are easy and, as you can see from charlotte @lisamedia's cat, and Amos, mine, very affectionate!!
she did. she's laying with her head on my wrist, in front of my keyboard purring.
@akula that's how i feel about all of the social media "experts" out there.
she's btwn me and the keyboard.... this is complicated!!
yeah, she adores me... tho we've never figured out why. :P did u see i am $350 closer to my tattoo?? /excited!!!
hrm. well, i guess we'll have to see what happens tomorrow. it was kinda harrowing to get here on the bus... slidey!
hi
where did SEARCH go??? Can I not search my friends like I can on Facebook???? (grr, twitter)
sheeeeet and now, I can't remember the handle I need to talk to. sigh. *goes through list*
2nd moral of humpty dumpty: don't send horses to perform medical services.
Moral of Humpty Dumpty: Don't sit on a wall if you're an Egg. GOOOD advice.
on a roll re: writing. Yay me. watching Ricky Gervais & sipping ceasars. (num)
My Top Three Cocktail Books for 2008: I’m adding to my own personal wishlist for this year, and started go.. http://tinyurl.com/62snl7
I do not like it sam I am,I do not like it when people follow me and don't have a picture or bio up. I will not eat green eggs and ham.
...trying to remember all the social networks i'm on in order to list them is harder than I thought!!
it was "Sad Single Man" night at FatBurger tonight. there was us, a mom w her kid, and 6 others. single guys, eating alone. moping. w/ beer.
Yawn. I want a nap, but i have colour in my hair and a meeting after this
I know chica no worries!
hey go me! I found wifi!
Oh great. He's going to make of look like "a giant freaking poinsetta"
OK... it's been fun kids, but I have to go to the salon. If i manage to hop on wifi there, i'll be back, otherwise, catch ya later!
Finlandia Vodka Cup: I recently had the immense pleasure of being a judge at Finlandia Vodka’s “Vodk.. http://tinyurl.com/6x4le2
ok. sleeping now. more posting to come tomorrow. 2 for BN, 2 for Drinks and even more for spas and offices. :)
Hold up - how did i not know about drinks media wire???
The Hard to Find, and Otherwise Weird Ingredients: I’m still working on my full-fledged “cocktail ge.. http://tinyurl.com/5u2agg
my dog does *not* like octopi. He takes all the legs off so it goes from being an octopus to being just a pus.
Review: Maestro Dobel Diamond Tequila: Typically, a tequila is classed as a sliver or gold. There are definitely.. http://tinyurl.com/6ler92
these poor girls... they've got to deal with some **creepy** men.
watching "CatHouse" on HBO. this is the most bizarre show ever. a mom brought her 22 yo virgin son to a legal whore house in NV.
milk intolerance? you can #sukkit. i'm having some of my peppermint peppermint ice cream.
oh yay! I only have to write three posts on Drinks After Dark. I can do that! :D yay!
Online Video Works Out for Charity: MemeLabs, the online video contest gurus, have a new contest, and one that s.. http://tinyurl.com/5n8hce
:( i wish i had some eggs here.
gah. got a PR "pitch" (term used loosely) from "Sidni". 19 yr old who wants to stand out from the "crowd"?
ok. so, BRR.
Oh Hai? Insomnia? You can #biteme. Also, #suckit bitch. Love, me.
gah. 5 am and my stupid text message sound woke me up. Now, sleep eludes me and all i can hear are the snow plows on the hwy
yay! @lisamedia is giving me a cool new game. So much for blogging tonight. :P well, for a little while @ least.
that was *completely* not completed. oops. :P
Charlotte the cat has completed adopted me.
